required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of PD1 Combined With DC-NK Cell in the Treatment of Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study on the Safety and Efficacy of PD1 Combined With DC-NK Cell in the Treatment of Solid Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Allife Medical Science and Technology Co., Ltd.

collaborator.agency: The First People's Hospital of Yunan Province/First People's Hospital of Yunan Provinve New Kunhua Hospital

clinical_study.source: Allife Medical Science and Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: clinical study on the safety and efficacy of PD1 combined with dc-Nk in the treatment of solid tumors

primary_outcome.measure: occurrence of treatment related adverse events
primary_outcome.description: occurrence of treatment related adverse events that are possible, likely. Or definitely related to study treatment.

intervention.description: total dose of 10ml KEYTRUDA® (pembrolizumab) will be administered at day0, 60million DC cells and 3 billion NK at day1, 3 billion NK cells at day2, 3 billion NK cells at day3 .
